mapper.insert:
replace INTO order_info (order_goods_id, order_sn, platform_order_sn, goods_name, platform_order_goods_sn, platform_order_status, province_name, city_name, district_name, shipping_address, mobile, receive_name, platform_sku_id, style_value, platform_goods_id, seller_note, refund_status, tracking_number, shipping_name, outer_id, shipping_time, shop_name, pay_time, goods_amount, pay_amount, order_amount, seller_discount, platform_discount, goods_number, sku_number) VALUES
(#{order.orderGoodsId}, #{order.orderSn}, #{order.platformOrderSn}, #{order.goodsName}, #{order.platformOrderGoodsSn}, #{order.platformOrderStatus}, #{order.provinceName}, #{order.cityName}, #{order.districtName}, #{order.shippingAddress}, #{order.mobile}, #{order.receiveName}, #{order.platformSkuId}, #{order.styleValue}, #{order.platformGoodsId}, #{order.sellerNote}, #{order.refundStatus}, #{order.trackingNumber}, #{order.shippingName}, #{order.outerId}, #{order.shippingTime}, #{order.shopName}, #{order.payTime}, #{order.goodsAmount}, #{order.payAmount}, #{order.orderAmount}, #{order.sellerDiscount}, #{order.platformDiscount}, #{order.goodsNumber}, #{order.skuNumber})
